ing: 2 slices lemon, or more to taste
des: "To make this refreshing summer cocktail, vigorously shake vodka, simple syrup, and lemon juice with lemon and cucumber slices. Pour into a Collins glass and top with a splash of club soda. This simple and refreshing cocktail is a signature drink at the Tiny Lounge in Chicago."
ins: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour vodka, simple syrup, lemon juice, cucumber slices, and lemon slices into shaker; cover and shake until chilled. Pour cocktail into a Collins glass and top with a splash of club soda.
